p: According to the results shown in Table 3, the WVP decreased with increasing the concentration of DbE in formulae ( p < .05). Film‐free DbE (F6) and the film containing 600 ppm of DbE (F9) had the highest and the lowest permeability, respectively ( p < .05), which is consistent with the findings of Sánchez‐González, Vargas, Gonzalez‐Martinez, Chiralt, and Chafer ( 2009) and Pérez‐Gago and Rhim ( 2014). Sánchez‐González, Chiralt, Gonzalez‐Martinez, and Cháfer ( 2011) reported that adding 3% of bergamot essential oil to chitosan film resulted in a 50% reduction in WVP, due to the increased hydrophobicity of the film containing essential oil.
